ID: CN7Q6J4_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-21 11:58
Subject: Audit Calendar Update, Jacquemus Season Sale, The Deal: Summer Unleashed, Weekly Internal Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Audit Calendar Update

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1561&user=10620> 	

Planning your upcoming projects? We've made some important updates to the 2025 Internal Audit Calendar.

Visit the Internal Audit page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1561&user=10620>  on One Chalhoub to see what's changed and get prepared.

Stay audit ready!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

JACQUEMUS END OF SEASON SALE







Enjoy a flat 60% discount on all sale items until August 3rd.

To access the sale online, log in using your Chalhoub Group account here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1562&user=10620> . The discount will be applied automatically at check-out.

chunks.text:
To access the sale online, log in using your Chalhoub Group account here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1562&user=10620> . The discount will be applied automatically at check-out.

Or you can visit our Dubai Mall boutique and present your Chalhoub Group ID or One Chalhoub Profile.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1562&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

The Deal: 
Sumer Unleashed

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1563&user=10620> 	

Our Summer Unleashed campaign is now live, offering up to 90% off on top designer brands.

We're rolling out fresh lines throughout the season across fashion, accessories, and more.

Check them out here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1563&user=10620> .

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES
